revised_title: Field-ion Microscopy of Dilute Substitutional Solid Solutions: Iridium-based Alloys
tldr: This study investigates the atomic arrangements in dilute iridium-based substitutional solid solutions using field-ion microscopy. The research aims to understand the structure and properties of these materials by examining the local arrangements around particular atoms. Field-ion microscopy provides direct information about the location of specific species and reveals aspects of the surface electronic state of each atom with respect to its coordinating surroundings.
